name: MUNICIPAL AUTHORITY OF the CITY OF MONONGAHELA and the CITY OF MONONGAHELA, Petitioners, v. CARROLL TOWNSHIP AUTHORITY and the Township of Carroll, Respondents
name_abbreviation: Municipal Authority v. Carroll Township Authority

parties: MUNICIPAL AUTHORITY OF the CITY OF MONONGAHELA and the CITY OF MONONGAHELA, Petitioners, v. CARROLL TOWNSHIP AUTHORITY and the Township of Carroll, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
AND NOW, this 30th day of March, 2001, the above-listed matter is GRANTED, LIMITED to the following issue:
1) Whether the Commonwealth Court erred when it determined that the Rules of Civil Procedure apply to this matter.

casebody.head_matter:
768 A.2d 858
MUNICIPAL AUTHORITY OF the CITY OF MONONGAHELA and the CITY OF MONONGAHELA, Petitioners, v. CARROLL TOWNSHIP AUTHORITY and the Township of Carroll, Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 30, 2001.
